duties.title: PRA Process Gives You Access
duties.content:
You must go through the Personnel Risk Assessment process to be classified as full Defender before receiving Physical, Electronic, or Information Access. That includes a background check and cyber security training (you're taking it right now, so pay attention, Cadet!)

POTENTIAL ISSUES

Trying to gain physical, electronic, or information access without first becoming a Defender and going through the PRA process.

duties.title: PRA Process Gives Vendors Access
duties.content:
Vendor must also go through the PRA process before being given access. Please coordinate vendor access requests with Corporate Security.

POTENTIAL ISSUES

Giving a vendor physical or electronic access without following the PRA process.

duties.title: Maintain Your Defender Status
duties.content:
When requested to do so, take the cyber security training required every year and cooperate with Corporate Security every seven years to renew your background check.

Please refrain from illegal activities - don't install dopamine-enhancing microchip implants or drug synthesis chips and don't deal them. Definitely don't randomly laser-blast someone or use wasteland-survival skills on anyone except in self-defense or unless you're pretty sure they are a robot. Keep that background check clean.

POTENTIAL ISSUES

  • Not completing cyber-security training each year.
  • Not having an updated background check every seven years.
  • Not self-reporting any personal arrest as soon as possible. In this case, personnel may not access a CIP Related Cyber Asset until their immediate APS leader and APS Corporate Security authorize them to do so.

    An arrest occurs when:

    • A law enforcement agency takes an individual into custody or issues a criminal citation to the individual
    • The individual is the subject of an arrest warrant
    • The individual receives a criminal indictment by a Grand Jury or other legal proceeding

    Failure to report an arrest to your leader and Corporate Security, may result in disciplinary action, up to and including termination.

  • Joining the Robo-Workers Party

duties.title: Notify of Access Changes Promptly
duties.content:
If you supervise employees or vendors who have access of any type, immediately (within 24 hours) notify HR of any changes or plans to change someone's employment status or role.

POTENTIAL ISSUES

Not notifying HR in a timely manner of employment changes

duties.title: Share Your BCSI Data With Care
duties.content:
BES Cyber System Information (BCSI) has different access requirements than CRCAs. While assets contain BCSI and should not be removed without following disposal procedures, some BCSI exists as electronic or paper documents. Don't move this information or provide it to third parties without following the sharing and transit procedures. It's very easy to inadvertently create BCSI or allow an unauthorized third party to capture BCSI by simply taking pictures of computer monitors or wallboards with a cell phone camera. Be vigilant.

POTENTIAL ISSUES

Sharing BCSI with third parties or enabling them to collect BCSI without following procedures
